website_summaries.verdict: A feature-packed robotic vacuum that makes life easier for owners. A best pick thanks to how powerful it is.
pros: Handles multiple flooring types, seamlessly navigating from one type to another
Easy to use and maintain due to tangle-free extractors
Has the most smart features in its class
cons: Needs a clear line of sight to locate home base
Problems navigating shag, deep pile, and clutter

customer_reviews.title: GREAT OPTION AND POWERFUL CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this machine. Intelligent functionality and intense cleaning on both hard floors and thick carpets. Can’t see why you need to pay the extra for the 980. Bin size is critical as this is what needs most of your attention while cleaning. Also looked at Dyson but the customer service experience was very poor. So good machine and good experience- this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Thorough little helper
customer_reviews.text: The algorithm for room exploration is very good. Does a comprehensive job. I have it set on a daily job and it keeps the rooms tidy and pet hair free. I am always surprised at how much stuff it manages to pick up even on a daily run.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Labour saving device . I have 2 dogs & this helps to keep the hair down. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery, gets stuck easily, does not go back to its station
customer_reviews.text: The product worked fine for 8-9 months, then it would never complete its job. It's supposed to go back its charging station when battery is low, but we had to find it all around the house. Even after sending for repairs to Germany, there was no improvement. It's been to Germany twice, still no improvement.The supplier and amazon has refused to replace after repeated requests. Amazon says, they don't sell it anymore, but it's there on listing. Just avoid it. I am frustrated and un-happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a manual vacuum that cost 5% as much
customer_reviews.text: The intelligence is pretty pathetic, it struggles to find its way back to base a lot of the time, gets stuck for no apparent reason, alleges that the container is full when it isn't, gets fluff stuck in the rollers. Poor all round really, it might be acceptable if it cost around £150. I had to buy a handheld for £30 to clear up all the crap it leaves behind.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Keeps floors clean, forces you to be tidier too :)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome when it works, there is a bit of a learning curve with furniture/items that might get it stuck. Would still highly recommend it though, as it is great at maintenance vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: it's brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Dont know how i'd live without it now, it's brilliant

customer_reviews.title: I wanted this bad boy for a very long time!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this bad boy for a very long time! I read lists of different products and I finally decided for this one. I am so impressed by how clean leaves the floors and how great the app is as well. The fact that I don't see fluff of dust flying on the floor is just a pleasure. I doubt could live without it now that he is part of the family
customer_reviews.author: Fernando G. Yache

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Great Vacuum, cleans really well if cleaning every other day. Easy to maintain. Easy to set up. Easy to use. Good suction. Isn’t brilliant at cleaning the edges but does a fair job. Suction on carpet is also good. Emptying the collection box and cleaning the filter is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rue

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vac
customer_reviews.text: We have rugs and hardwood. He does a great job on both, and the only thing he gets a bit hung up on is the base of our Poang chairs. I give it five stars anyway because the convenience is AMAZING and the app is very helpful. Extremely satisfied with this Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: ErinC

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this product. Does a far better clean than I expected. Intention was to use between 'proper' cleans but am instead using the 'one cleaning pass' option for the in-between cleans & the full clean option when I would normally vacuum. Only manually cleaning stairs now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is wonderful addition to our family
customer_reviews.text: What can i say! How did I mangae without Roomba! He is wonderful addition to our family:)

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought our roomba back in January because I got tired cjeajingbup the floor after our young kids ate. We were a bit concerned whether the roomba would work with our carpet (pictured), and how much of our Lego it would eat. Experience is great. The machine cleans superbly, handles the carpet very well. We carry it in other floors to clean there, no problem. Very small Lego (1ers, flat pieces) get eaten but most of it gets pushed aside. Every now and then it needs the be emptied which is dry easy to do without needing to read the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Probably
